title: 1942 ' Neath Brooklyn Bridge ( East Side Kids, Ann Gillis)

sources.title: CopyOf1942NeathBrooklynBridgeEastSideKidsAnnGillisDaveOBrien.3gp
sources.description: The East Side Kids find a young girl in the apartment of a man who has just been murdered. Believing her to be innocent, they hide her in their clubhouse while they try to find the real Killer. Cast Leo Gorcey ... Mugs Bobby Jordan ... Danny Huntz Hall ... Glimpy Gabriel Dell ... Skid Noah Beery Jr. ... Butch Marc Lawrence ... McGaffey Ann Gillis ... Sylvia  Dave O'Brien ... Sergeant Lyons Ernest Morrison ... Scruno  Stanley Clements ... Stash Bobby Stone ... Skinny Jack Raymond ... Sniffy Betty Wells ... Dancer Dewey Robinson ... Captain Patsy Moran ... Mrs. Glimpy Jack Mulhall ... Sergeant Bud Osborne ... Morley  J. Arthur Young ... Bright Eyes Franklyn Farnum ... Policeman  Jack Kenney ... Police Officer Kenny  Frank Moran ... Mike - Bartender  George Morrell ... Second Soup Customer  'Snub' Pollard ... Soup Customer  Betty Sinclair ... Dress Saleswoman    Directed by Wallace Fox Screenplay by Harvey Gates Story by Harvey Gates Associate Producer Barney A. Sarecky Producers Jack Dietz, Sam Katzman Cinematography by Mark Stengler Film Editing by Carl Pierson Art Direction by Dave Milton Assistant Director Arthur Hammond Details Country USA Release Date: November 20, 1942 Production Co: Banner Productions, Monogram Pictures --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
